title: U.S.-Taiwan: Navigating AI, Tech, and Diplomacy in an Evolving Partnership
description: High-level officials from Taiwan and the U.S. attended a forum to discuss cooperation in artificial intelligence, technology, and drones. The meeting highlighted the vital economic partnership between the two nations despite lacking formal diplomatic recognition. Key agreements were signed, focusing on AI and semiconductor supply chains, economic security, and investment.
content: Senior officials from Taiwan and the United States convened at a high-level forum to discuss collaboration on artificial intelligence, technology, and drones, reinforcing their critical economic partnership amid the absence of formal diplomatic ties.... [631 chars]

title: India Braces for AI Revolution: New Opportunities Amid Job Shifts
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is reshaping job landscapes by eliminating repetitive tasks while creating new opportunities. India's top science advisor highlights the government's efforts to prepare the youth through training and AI labs. The AI mission includes skilling initiatives and international collaborations to harness AI's benefits nationwide.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is emerging as a transformative technology, poised to both displace repetitive jobs and generate new opportunities across various sectors. Ajay Kumar Sood, Principal Scientific Advisor to the Government of India, discusse... [779 chars]

title: South Korea's KOSPI posts sharpest rise in 3 weeks as investors buy the Trump tariff dip
description: South Korean stocks saw a significant jump on Tuesday. This surge was powered by a strong rally in technology shares, boosted by global demand for artificial intelligence. The market shrugged off a threat from US President Donald Trump to increase tariffs on Korean goods. Chipmakers Samsung Electronics and SK Hynix led the gains. Automakers also recovered from initial dips.

title: Bernalillo County weighs strict limits on AI data centers in New Mexico
description: Bernalillo County commissioners are considering a resolution to restrict new data centers and artificial intelligence campuses within the county, requiring renewable energy, local hiring and water-use offsets as major AI infrastructure projects advance across the state.
content:
